Activity: Log in to the EHR system and check for any weekend preparation tasks.
Conduct final patient assessments for the week, ensuring all influenza symptoms are documented.
Complete all pending EHR data entries and cross-check for accuracy.
Email @itpm-1 and @ehrv-1 with a summary of the week's data collection and any issues encountered.
Participate in a team debrief with @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 to discuss the week's findings and improvements.
Update the EHR with any final notes or corrections from the debrief.
Organize and archive patient assessment records for the week.
Log out of the EHR system and prepare for the weekend.
